definition: sour/tart/sick at heart/grieved/sore/aching/pedantic/impractical/to make sarcastic remarks about sb/an acid

sentences.english: Conclusion Silver nitrate was of obviously the inhibitory effects on common respiratory pathogens.
sentences.chinese: 結論硝酸銀對常見呼吸道病原體有明顯的抑制作用。

sentences.english: Acids react with bases to form salts.
sentences.chinese: 硝酸銀是一種鹽類化合物。

sentences.english: And silver nitrate is occasionally used to treat warts and corns.
sentences.chinese: 而硝酸銀可偶爾用於治療疣和雞眼。

sentences.english: A new method of silver nitrate preparation from waste photosensitive materials has studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了從廢感光材料中製備硝酸銀的工藝。

sentences.english: Objective To determine the inhibition effects of silver nitrate on common respiratory pathogens.
sentences.chinese: 目的證實硝酸銀對常見呼吸道病原體具有抑制作用。

sentences.english: This is the table salt and this is the silver nitrate.
sentences.chinese: 裏面分別是氯化鈉溶液和硝酸銀溶液。

sentences.english: Instead of silver nitrite mercuric nitrite may be used.
sentences.chinese: 可以用亞硝酸汞來代替亞硝酸銀。

sentences.english: Therefore, this method can be popularized to other laboratory consuming large silver nitrate.
sentences.chinese: 該工藝可推廣到硝酸銀消耗量較大的其他化驗室。

sentences.english: It was not without difficulty that the chloruretted lotions and the nitrate of silver overcame the gangrene.
sentences.chinese: 好不容易纔用氯化洗劑和硝酸銀治癒了壞疽。
